title: Sampler Blanket #6
medium:
Medium: wool, polyester
Technique: needle punched wool and wool applique with machine embroidery
description: Dark brown background with lighter shade at the top and bottom.  There are white cross-stitch patterns in the upper left and lettering in the upper right, a yellow A and bright pink Z and C. In the middle right is a white deer.  Cherry blossoms feature prominently in patterned light green, shadowed by white embroidery.
name: Blanket
